programme.title: COZI - WTAE ACTION NEWS
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch Pittsburgh news and weather from Pittsburgh's Action News 4.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Florida Fugitive
programme.desc: Weeks after a pregnant woman is shot and killed in Orlando, a shootout between her suspected killer and a police officer sparks a manhunt.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Homebody Seeks New Heights
programme.desc: When it comes to nature, Maddie Carlin is a self-proclaimed Debbie Downer. Kinga is in Milwaukee to convince her to give nature another chance. They’re traveling across the state, looking for an adventure to inspire Maddie to get off the couch!

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: World Traveler Comes Home for Love
programme.desc: After traveling the world, Colleen is back home in Cincinnati looking to settle down but not settle. As she looks to find her forever mate, three single guys try impress her with a painting, curling on the ice and a tango lesson.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Football Star Shooting
programme.desc: A beloved University of Kentucky football player is murdered on the porch of his house during his 21st birthday party in an assassination-style killing. What leads to the shooter's capture is equally shocking.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown & Beyond: Adventure Awaits
programme.desc: Join Rob on an rugged outdoor adventure as he pushes himself to the limit from skydiving to ziplining in some of New England’s most scenic spots.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Huge Evidence Hauls Seen on the Force
programme.desc: Whether it’s gathering thousands of mysterious, colorful packets stuffed in a store’s ceiling or valuable wildlife slithering to freedom, investigators must be ready to decisively face a range of mammoth tasks in the field.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Massive Tattoo Giveaway and Baking Cookies for An Entire State
programme.desc: After giving away thousands of tattoos to Chaos & Kindness fans, Justin and Ryan hit the kitchen to make cookies to share across New Hampshire.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Unity in the Community
programme.desc: Celebrate the stories from across the country of community members uniting to uplift and support each other, from nonprofits to athletic organizations, schools and everyday individuals who change lives every day.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Sealed With A Kiss
programme.desc: Daniel is a Sac-town native, works in IT and is not only very active, but actively looking for a relationship. He’ll be rocking climbing, painting in the park and wine tasting, all in the name of finding a local love.

programme.title: Restaurants on the Radar
programme.sub-title: Restaurant on the Radar: Street Food
programme.desc: Travel around the world without leaving the City Beautiful behind! Brendan samples street food from all over the globe: Laotian delicacies, a fresh spin on falafel, and so much more.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Spice It Up
programme.desc: This is gonna be a hot one. Chefs Ryan Grace and Roger Li are getting spicy in today’s Spice It Up challenge. Will our chefs bring the heat? Or will the competition be too hot to handle?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Brains and Beauty Getting Dirty
programme.desc: Dr. Treva Brown holds a PhD in Chemistry, works for the US Naval Research Laboratory and is a pageant queen. This workaholic PhDiva can’t make time for herself! Kinga wants to take Treva off the runway and into the outdoors.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Po' Boys and Jokes
programme.desc: Local comedy duos debate the best po' boys in the city, get fit and flexible, discover vintage threads and more on two cheap "dates" in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Kara & Jessica
programme.desc: A Missouri community seeks answers when two young women disappear a decade apart

programme.title: Mo Gaba: Spirit Lives Forever
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: How a child living with cancer changed the Baltimore sports community forever.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Kansas City Gives Classic Cocktails a Spirited Twist
programme.desc: Master bartender Kate Gerwin visits Kansas City to talk whiskey, taste the nonalcoholic future at an innovative new bar, experience jazz at the Mutual Musicians Foundation, and learn all about Prohibition in the city that ignored it best.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.sub-title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: On The Job: Brendan Finds Beasts in the Orange Groves
programme.desc: Brendan explores a beautiful orange grove while giving a tour on a school bus monster truck, pampers some pals at a European beer spa, and works the late-shift to make the best Philly cheesesteak outside the City of Brotherly Love.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The DNA of Murders
programme.desc: Three brutal cold cases remain unsolved for decades until advances in forensic technology bring investigators closer than ever to finding answers for the victims’ families and friends.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.sub-title: West by Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Superfan With Cerebral Palsy Surprised With Magical Night
programme.desc: Darlene, a young superfan with cerebral palsy, becomes Justin's date for one magical night after the team hears her story and learns how much she loves the show.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Will This Harbor Happy Hour Turn Sour?
programme.desc: It's 5 o'clock in Baltimore! Belly up to the bar and watch Chefs Kevanna Gilmore and Cat Smith battle it out. Who will shake up the competition, and who will end up on the rocks?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Nature Calls in Lake Charles, LA
programme.desc: Bring your best friend along and check into Bohotopia. Then check out Gator Chateau, drink a beer at Crying Eagle, and ditch your inhibitions while devouring adult mac n’ cheese. It all happens in Lake Charles, Louisiana.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Love's Just a Game for Kurt's Heart
programme.desc: Kurt the Flirt is ready to get serious and settle down. Will it be Natalia, the glam gamer? Kerri, the total catch who loves baseball? Or Alicia, the animal-lover with a great sense of humor?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Wildest Fakes and Forgeries
programme.desc: Escaping prison by forging the judge's signature? Biting a police officer after being arrested for check fraud? Selling stolen homes using phony papers? You won't want to miss these wild scams.

programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Queens of Birmingham
programme.sub-title: Queens of Birmingham
programme.desc: Queens of Birmingham invites you to slip into your high heels and sashay over the rainbow. Join the DREAMCAST of Al's on 7th, the region's preeminent drag bar, and meet the fiercest divas in the South.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Mystery of Maura Murray
programme.desc: Known as one of the first cases of the digital age, Maura Murray's mysterious disappearance continues to confound investigators and internet sleuths.
